definition: (card games) the act of taking a trick with a trump when unable to follow suit, play a trump
details:
noun
- (card games) the act of taking a trick with a trump when unable to follow suit
= synonyms: trumping
- common Eurasian sandpiper
= example: common Eurasian sandpiper
- a high tight collar
= synonyms: ruffle
- an external body part consisting of feathers or hair about the neck of a bird or other animal
= synonyms: frill
verb
- play a trump
= synonyms: trump
